Co.,Ltd.) :2205001255-02S2, 200-127973-0020_01 *[[Broadcom BCM94350ZAE]] - (NGFF 2230, key A+E) [PCIe/SDIO 3.0] :[[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/wireless-connectivity/wireless-lan/bcm4350 BCM4350] (802.11a/b/g/n/ac + BT, 2x2, 2.4/5GHz) • [http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s768605 PR]

:Linux driver: [[Brcmfmac]] [http://wireless.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/brcm80211 brcm80211] [14e4:43a3] :Windows driver: [http://listing.driveragent.com/c/pci/14e4/43a3 Win8 14e4:43a3] ==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://osxlatitude.com/forums/topic/11322-dw1820a-broadcom-bcm4350-chipset-under-high-sierramojave Broadcom BCM4350 cards under High Sierra/Mojave @ '''OSXlatitude'''] :[[Dell Wireless 1820A (DW1820A)]] • CN-0VW3T3 [14e4:43a3/[[1028]]:0021] :Foxconn T77H649.00 • [[Lenovo]] FRU: 00JT494 [14e4:43a3/[[17aa]]:075a] :[[Lite-On WCBN808B]]-L6 • [[Lenovo]] FRU: 00JT493 • [[Dell]] PN: CN-0VW3T3 *[https://forums.opensuse.org/showthread.php/507933-openSUSE-on-the-2015-Apple-12-Inch-Retina-MacBook ''Broadcom BCM94350'' card on '''opensuse.org''' forums] :Apple MacBook 12" (Retina, 2015) [14e4:43a3/[[106b]]:0131] *[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/pub?key=0Arr23WYNror4dHNPbUVyakY5THExY0tNbU5hR2xaR1E&gid=1 Compatibility table for NGFF modules (with photo) @ '''Skvo'''] :*[http://www.tonymacx86.com/network/104850-guide-airport-pcie-half-mini-v2-76.html List of PCIe / NGFF devices @ '''tonymacx86'''] :*[http://portal.nca.org.gh/search_type_approval_view_details.php?typeApproveDetailID=743 ''Broadcom BCM94350ZAE'' on '''NCA'''] ==Pictures==
